meanings.sent1: The special material superconducts when cooled to a very low temperature.
meanings.sent2: The wire superconducts electricity without any hindrance.
meanings.sent3: The fridge superconducts so well, it keeps ice cream frozen forever!
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her craft superconducts through her flawless performances.
meanings.sent5: The magic potion superconducts energy, making everything around it glow.

meanings.sent2: The copper wire superconducts electricity better than any other material.
meanings.sent3: The robot superconducts electricity like a lightning bolt, powering up instantly.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm superconducts through the team, sparking motivation in everyone.
meanings.sent5: The sun superconducts light across the vast expanse of space.

meanings.sent1: The superconductor superconducts effortlessly, allowing electricity to flow without any obstacles.
meanings.sent2: The superconducting material superconducts perfectly, ensuring no energy is lost.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's suit superconducts power, making them invincible to electrical attacks.
meanings.sent4: The river superconducts smoothly, reflecting the clear blue sky above.
meanings.sent5: The idea superconducts through the minds of the students, spreading like wildfire.
